item.title: PUBLICATIONS
item.description: My publications and citation information can be found at Google Scholar. A Bernard, Y Peng, A Kasumov, R Deblock, M Ferrier, F Fortuna, VT Volkov, Yu A Kasumov, Y Oreg, F von Oppen, H Bouchiat, S Guéron, Long-lived Andreev states as evidence for protected hinge modes in a bismuth nanoring Josephson junction, Nature Physics, 19, 358–364, 2023 Yiran Zhang, Robert Polski, Cyprian Lewandowski, Alex Thomson, Yang Peng, Youngjoon Choi, Hyunjin Kim, Kenji Watanabe, Takashi Taniguchi, Jason Alicea, Felix von Oppen, Gil Refael, and Stevan Nadj-Perge, Promotion of superconductivity in magic-angle graphene multilayers, Science, 377(6614): 1538-1543, 2022 Yang Peng, Topological Space-Time Crystal, Phys.

item.title: Research
item.description: I am a condensed matter theorist interested in topological states of matter as well as their quantum dynamics. Particularly, I investigate the effect of the interplay between symmetry and topology of quantum systems on their static and dynamical properties. I am also interested in collaborating with experimentalists to understand STM and quantum transport measurements on different quantum materials. Specifically, I am current working on: Link to heading Topological phenomena in out-of-equilibrium quantum system Nonequilibrium quantum dynamics in general Interplay between symmetries and topology in quantum system 2D Morie materials
